授業目的: The aim of this course is to improve students’ fluency and confidence in speaking English through a communicative approach.  This course will provide opportunities for students to practice their oral English production through interactive and authentic tasks. As such, there is an emphasis on teamwork (pairs and groups) and students should expect to engage fully in conversation, using questions, suggestions, checking and responding.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, students should:
a) feel more confident interacting with others in English;
b) have developed their English speaking fluency;
c) have completed all the required tasks with the appropriate effort and attainment
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
